events.name: onFileUpload
events.description: Fired when a file should be uploaded to the cloud file provider.

allOf.name: account
allOf.description: The account used for the file upload.

allOf.name: tab
allOf.description: The tab where the upload was initiated. Currently only available for the message composer.

allOf.name: relatedFileInfo
allOf.description: Information about an already uploaded file, which is related to this upload.

aborted.description: Set this to <value>true</value> if the file upload was aborted by the user and an :ref:`cloudFile.onFileUploadAbort` event has been received. No error message will be shown to the user.

error.description: Report an error to the user. Set this to <value>true</value> for showing a generic error message, or set a specific error message.

url.description: The URL where the uploaded file can be accessed.

allOf.description: Additional file information used in the cloud file entry added to the message.

allOf.name: account
allOf.description: The account used for the file upload.

allOf.name: tab
allOf.description: The tab where the upload was initiated. Currently only available for the message composer.

events.name: onFileRename
events.description: Fired when a previously uploaded file should be renamed.

allOf.name: account
allOf.description: The account used for the file upload.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: An identifier for the file which should be renamed.

parameters.name: newName
parameters.description: The new name of the file.

allOf.name: tab
allOf.description: The tab where the rename was initiated. Currently only available for the message composer.

error.description: Report an error to the user. Set this to <value>true</value> for showing a generic error message, or set a specific error message.

url.description: The URL where the renamed file can be accessed.

events.name: onFileDeleted
events.description: Fired when a previously uploaded file should be deleted.

allOf.name: account
allOf.description: The account used for the file upload.

allOf.name: tab
allOf.description: The tab where the upload was initiated. Currently only available for the message composer.

events.name: onAccountAdded
events.description: Fired when a cloud file account of this add-on was created.

events.name: onAccountDeleted
events.description: Fired when a cloud file account of this add-on was deleted.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The id of the removed account.

functions.name: getAccount
functions.description: Retrieve information about a single cloud file account.

functions.name: getAllAccounts
functions.description: Retrieve all cloud file accounts for the current add-on.

configured.description: If true, the account is configured and ready to use. Only configured accounts are offered to the user.

uploadSizeLimit.description: The maximum size in bytes for a single file to upload. Set to <value>-1</value> if unlimited.

spaceRemaining.description: The amount of remaining space on the cloud provider, in bytes. Set to <value>-1</value> if unsupported.

spaceUsed.description: The amount of space already used on the cloud provider, in bytes. Set to <value>-1</value> if unsupported.

managementUrl.description: A page for configuring accounts, to be displayed in the preferences UI.

browser_style.description: Enable browser styles in the ``management_url`` page. See the `MDN documentation on browser styles <|link-mdn-browser-styles|>`__ for more information.

data_format.description: This property is no longer used. The only supported data format for the ``data`` argument in :ref:`cloudFile.onFileUpload` is |File|.

reuse_uploads.description: If a previously uploaded cloud file attachment is reused at a later time in a different message, Thunderbird may use the already known ``url`` and ``templateInfo`` values without triggering the registered :ref:`cloudFile.onFileUpload` listener again. Setting this option to <value>false</value> will always trigger the registered listener, providing the already known values through the ``relatedFileInfo`` parameter of the :ref:`cloudFile.onFileUpload` event, to let the provider decide how to handle these cases.

management_url.description: A page for configuring accounts, to be displayed in the preferences UI. **Note:** Within this UI only a limited subset of the WebExtension APIs is available: ``cloudFile``, ``extension``, ``i18n``, ``runtime``, ``storage``, ``test``.

name.description: Name of the cloud file service.

service_url.description: This property is no longer used. The ``service_url`` property of the :ref:`cloudFile.CloudFileTemplateInfo` object returned by the :ref:`cloudFile.onFileUpload` event can be used to add a Learn more about link to the footer of the cloud file attachment element.

CloudFileAccount.description: Information about a cloud file account.

configured.description: If true, the account is configured and ready to use. Only configured accounts are offered to the user.

name.description: A user-friendly name for this account.

uploadSizeLimit.description: The maximum size in bytes for a single file to upload. Set to <value>-1</value> if unlimited.

spaceRemaining.description: The amount of remaining space on the cloud provider, in bytes. Set to <value>-1</value> if unsupported.

spaceUsed.description: The amount of space already used on the cloud provider, in bytes. Set to <value>-1</value> if unsupported.

managementUrl.description: A page for configuring accounts, to be displayed in the preferences UI.

CloudFileTemplateInfo.description: Defines information to be used in the cloud file entry added to the message.

service_icon.description: A URL pointing to an icon to represent the used cloud file service. Defaults to the icon of the provider add-on.

service_name.description: A name to represent the used cloud file service. Defaults to the associated cloud file account name.

service_url.description: A URL pointing to a web page of the used cloud file service. Will be used in a Learn more about link in the footer of the cloud file attachment element.

download_password_protected.description: If set to true, the cloud file entry for this upload will include a hint, that the download link is password protected.

download_limit.description: If set, the cloud file entry for this upload will include a hint, that the file has a download limit.

download_expiry_date.description: If set, the cloud file entry for this upload will include a hint, that the link will only be available for a limited time.

timestamp.description: The expiry date of the link as the number of milliseconds since the UNIX epoch.

format.description: A format options object as used by |DateTimeFormat|. Defaults to: <literalinclude>includes/cloudFile/defaultDateFormat.js<lang>JavaScript</lang></literalinclude>

name.description: Filename of the file to be transferred.

data.description: Contents of the file to be transferred.

RelatedCloudFile.description: Information about an already uploaded cloud file, which is related to a new upload. For example if the content of a cloud attachment is updated, if a repeatedly used cloud attachment is renamed (and therefore should be re-uploaded to not invalidate existing links) or if the provider has its manifest property ``reuse_uploads`` set to <value>false</value>.

id.description: The identifier for the related file. In some circumstances, the id is unavailable.

url.description: The URL where the upload of the related file can be accessed.

allOf.description: Additional information of the related file, used in the cloud file entry added to the message.

dataChanged.description: The content of the new upload differs from the related file.
